title: art deco? groovy?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/el%202%20del%202000%20pasapalabra_5598.jpg)

Hi! I have to make a 2000 for a cake display and the customer has given me only the 2! He wants the whole number like the nr.2.  
Please could you help me to find the 0?  
Thanks in advance!!
author: silviita

comments.content: Kabel (either ITC or LT, bold or black depending on which cut)
Thank you so much!!! Now I will try to make it with the same shades and color. :)

[https://openclipart.org/user-cliparts/binameusl](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025701/https:/openclipart.org/user-cliparts/binameusl "https://openclipart.org/user-cliparts/binameusl")  
 [https://openclipart.org/detail/80197/effect-letters-alphabet-red-by-bina...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025701/https:/openclipart.org/detail/80197/effect-letters-alphabet-red-by-binameusl-80197 "https://openclipart.org/detail/80197/effect-letters-alphabet-red-by-binameusl-80197")  
 [https://openclipart.org/detail/80149/effect-letters-alphabet-red-by-bina...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025701/https:/openclipart.org/detail/80149/effect-letters-alphabet-red-by-binameusl-80149 "https://openclipart.org/detail/80149/effect-letters-alphabet-red-by-binameusl-80149")

I am still looking for yellow.

EDIT  
An image search for "binameusl letter" may turn up some stuff.
Michel Boyer, thanks for the extra searching. Lesson learned: always go for the gold!
Wowwwww!!! I love you!! Thanks thanks thanks!!!
